CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(Today()), 1, DATE(YEAR(Today()),5,15) , 2, DATE(YEAR(Today()),5,15), 3, DATE( YEAR(Today()),5,15), 4, DATE(YEAR(Today()),8,15), 5, DATE(YEAR(Today()),8,15), 6, DATE(YEAR(Today()),8,15), 7, DATE(YEAR(Today()),11,15), 8, DATE(YEAR(Today()),11,15), 9, DATE(YEAR(Today()),11,15), 10, DATE(YEAR(Today())+1,2,15), 11, DATE(YEAR(Today())+1,2,15), 12,DATE(YEAR(Today())+1,2,15), null)
CustomField.label: 45th Day from Last Quarter
